definition.text: This style is used in Docs Books to define a new chapeter for that book. The style renders in the book's page the index of the Docs Topics referenced.

paragraphs.text: Chapter Number->Project->Docs Page Category->Docs Category Name->Intruction Text
Chapter Number: Any string that represents the chapter number to be displayed.
Project : Is the project where the Docs Page belongs to.
Docs Page Category : Topic or Tutorial.
Docs Category Name: For topics, the topic's name, for tutorials, is the tutorial's name.
Introduction Text: It is an introduction text to be displayed between the Chapter Title and the Chapter Index. This parameter is optional.
IV->Superalgos->Tutorial->Getting Started->This is the first tutorial you should do.
